content.question: In the context of the late 1930s, the arguments that Hitler makes in the last paragraph are most significant in explaining how

choices.label: the Great Depression gave fascist states an excuse to take over all aspects of economic production
imperialist aspirations contributed to motivating the policies of fascist states
the protectionist policies of Western European states contributed to economic collapse in fascist states
fascist regimes in Europe used settler colonies to provide soldiers for their armies

content.answer: imperialist aspirations contributed to motivating the policies of fascist states

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
